text: When you are in a social setting, how do you usually feel?

options.content: Energized and excited
Comfortable but prefer small groups
Neutral, it depends on the people around
Drained and in need of alone time
Address it head-on and openly
Try to resolve it diplomatically
Avoid it when possible
Withdraw and keep to myself

text: How do you prefer to spend your free time?

options.content: Going out with friends or attending events
Having a mix of social and solitary activities
Engaging in solitary hobbies like reading or gardening
Spending quiet time alone, recharging

text: When working on a project, you prefer to:

options.content: Collaborate with a team and share ideas
Work with a small group of trusted colleagues
Work independently but seek occasional input
Work alone, preferring to focus without interruptions

text: How do you recharge after a long day?

options.content: Socializing or engaging in active pursuits
A combination of relaxing and talking to friends
Engaging in quiet hobbies like reading or drawing
Spending time alone, in a calm and quiet environment
